     <div itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ItemList">
      <div class="gamma">
       <div class="article article-tri-headline" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
        <meta content="1" itemprop="position"/>
        <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
         <a href="/news/article-9353015/Joe-Biden-say-Americans-celebrate-July-4-small-groups.html" itemprop="url">
          Biden says US will be closer to normal' by July 4, EVERY ADULT will be eligible for the COVID vaccine by May 1, slams Trump for letting the virus spread 'unchecked' and takes credit for Operation Warp Speed in first prime time speech
         </a>
        </h2>
        <a href="/news/article-9353015/Joe-Biden-say-Americans-celebrate-July-4-small-groups.html">
         <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/8058414044313962976/308x174_JPG_8058414044313962976.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="70" data-frame-height="160" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/8058414044313962976/636x382_JPG-HD_8058414044313962976.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="70" data-hd-frame-height="330" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/8058414044313962976/964x580_JPG-SINGLE_8058414044313962976.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/8058414044313962976/964x580_MP4_8058414044313962976.mp4" height="500" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="964"/>
         <noscript>
          <img height="500" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/8058414044313962976/964x580_JPG-SINGLE_8058414044313962976.jpg" width="964"/>
         </noscript>
        </a>
        <div class="articletext">
         <div>
          <p>
           President Joe Biden asked Americans to stay the course fighting the coronavirus while offering hope that life could begin to return to normal later this summer. In a prime time address to the nation, given from the East Room of the White House, Biden outlined the steps his administration has taken to combat the deadly disease, claiming he would meet his original goal of 100 million shots in 100 days by his 16th day in office. No other country in the world has done this. None, he said. He said because of the work his administration has done in securing more doses of the vaccine  including brokering a partnership between Merck and Johnson &amp; Johnson  he would make all adults eligible to receive the vaccine by May. I want to talk about the next steps we're thinking about first tonight. I'm announcing that will direct all states, tribes and territories to make all adults, people 18 and over eligible to be vaccinated, no later than May 1, he said. That's much earlier than expected. He also said the nation was going from 1 million shots a day to 2 million shots a day, outpacing the rest of the world. After bragging about the goals he was breaking, he announced an ambitious goal for the nation. July 4th with your loved one is the goal, he said. But, for that to happen, I need you, he said. I need every American to do their part. He urged people to get vaccinated, socially distance and wear face masks so the country wouldnt have to reinstate restrictions in order to get the virus back under control.
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>

      <div class="gamma">
       <div class="news item thin_divide module">
        <div class="thin-split ccox link-ccox linkro-box bdrcc">
         <h6>
         </h6>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="gamma">
      </div>
      <div class="cleared lead-alpha">
       <div class="alpha">
        <div class="column-splitter">
         <div class="column-split first-column">
          <div class="article article-large cleared" data-original-title="John Dean, White House counsel under Nixon, says Trump will be indicted in 'matter of days'" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
           <meta content="2" itemprop="position"/>
           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9352849/John-Dean-White-House-counsel-Nixon-says-Trump-indicted-matter-days.html" itemprop="url">
             White House counsel who blew the whistle on Nixon's role in Watergate believes Manhattan DA will indict Trump in a 'matter of days' after Michael Cohen met prosecutors for the seventh time
            </a>
           </h2>
           <a href="/news/article-9352849/John-Dean-White-House-counsel-Nixon-says-Trump-indicted-matter-days.html">
            <img alt="John Dean, White House counsel under Nixon, says Trump will be indicted in 'matter of" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/12/01/40365612-0-image-m-2_1615512189772.jpg" height="500" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="308"/>
            <noscript>
             <img alt="John Dean, White House counsel under Nixon, says Trump will be indicted in 'matter of" height="500" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/12/01/40365612-0-image-m-2_1615512189772.jpg" width="308"/>
            </noscript>
           </a>
           <div class="articletext-holder">
            <p>
             John Dean, who delivered pivotal testimony in 1973 that helped cause Nixon to resign after the Watergate scandal, shared his prediction via Twitter on Wednesday. It followed reports that Trump's former lawyer and fixer Michael Cohen reportedly met with Manhattan DA Cyrus Vance for a seventh interview in a sweeping investigation into alleged financial crimes by the Trump Organization. 'From personal experience, as a key witness, I assure you that you do not visit a prosecutor's office 7 times if they are not planning to indict those about whom you have knowledge,' Dean wrote. 'It is only a matter of how many days until DA Vance indicts Donald &amp; Co.' Pictured: Dean in 2019 (left) and 1973 (inset); Trump on the golf course on Wednesday (right).
            </p>

            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">

            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9352339/Man-sentenced-212-years-prison-killing-two-autistic-sons-life-insurance.html">

        <div class="home item gradient_divide module">
         <div class="gradient-split wocc link-wocc linkro-wocc">
          <h6>
           BIDEN ADMINISTRATION
          </h6>
          <div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9352851/Line-migrants-smuggled-Rio-Grande-border-crossings-SURGE.html">
           Video shows massive line of immigrants waiting to get rafts with human smugglers across the Rio Grande: Crossings surge but the Biden administration insists there is no border crisis
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/news/article-9352851/Line-migrants-smuggled-Rio-Grande-border-crossings-SURGE.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/3639674870035466923/308x174_JPG_3639674870035466923.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="66" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/3639674870035466923/636x382_JPG-HD_3639674870035466923.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="67" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/3639674870035466923/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_3639674870035466923.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/3639674870035466923/636x382_MP4_3639674870035466923.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/3639674870035466923/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_3639674870035466923.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            Shocking video shows a massive line of migrants being smuggled across the Rio Grande into Texas, despite President Joe Biden continuing to insist there is no crisis along the southern border. The clip, which was captured on Thursday morning by former Border Security Operations Center manager Jaeson Jones, shows dozens of migrants standing on an embankment as they wait for boats to bring them across into the United States. The small boats appear to be operated by people smugglers concealing their identities in ski masks.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline" data-social-first-article-links="">
          <ul class="article-icon-links cleared">
           <li class="facebook">

            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9353307/House-committee-consider-Dem-bid-overturn-Iowa-congressional-race-GOP-won-six-votes.html">

        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9353361/Biden-criticizes-surge-attacks-Asian-Americans-primetime-address.html">
           Biden condemns the surge in attacks on Asian-Americans who have been blamed for COVID and now 'fear for their lives while walking down the street'
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/news/article-9353361/Biden-criticizes-surge-attacks-Asian-Americans-primetime-address.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/8333984416527958101/308x174_JPG_8333984416527958101.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="50" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/8333984416527958101/636x382_JPG-HD_8333984416527958101.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="50" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/8333984416527958101/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_8333984416527958101.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/8333984416527958101/636x382_MP4_8333984416527958101.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/8333984416527958101/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_8333984416527958101.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            President Joe Biden made a special point to defend Asian-Americans - who have become victims of hate crimes throughout the COVID-19 pandemic - during his first primetime televised address. In his East Room remarks, Biden called out the 'vicious hate crimes against Asian-Americans, who have been attacked, harassed, blamed and scapegoated.' 'At this very moment, so many of them, our fellow Americans, are on the front lines of this pandemic trying to save lives and still, still they are forced to live in fear for their lives just walking down streets in America,' Biden continued. 'It's wrong, it's un-American and it must stop.'
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9351689/Pelosi-knocks-Republicans-focus-immigration-COVID-crisis.html" itemprop="url">

            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9351689/Pelosi-knocks-Republicans-focus-immigration-COVID-crisis.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/17/40349786-0-image-a-31_1615484858058.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>

             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/17/40349378-0-image-a-19_1615483016163.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>

        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9352121/Joe-Biden-signs-1-9tr-COVID-relief-plan-law.html">
           Biden signs his $1.9tn COVID relief plan into law, saying it will give working Americans a 'fighting chance': First $1,400 checks to hit bank accounts this weekend
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/news/article-9352121/Joe-Biden-signs-1-9tr-COVID-relief-plan-law.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/7647084570062797453/308x174_JPG_7647084570062797453.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="70" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/7647084570062797453/636x382_JPG-HD_7647084570062797453.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="70" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/7647084570062797453/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_7647084570062797453.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/7647084570062797453/636x382_MP4_7647084570062797453.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/7647084570062797453/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_7647084570062797453.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            President Joe Biden signed his $1.9 trillion COVID relief plan into law on Thursday, saying the'historic legislation' will restore 'the backbone of this country.' 'This historic legislation is about rebuilding the backbone of this country and giving people in this nation, working people, middle class folks, people who built the country a fighting chance. That's what the essence of this is,' he said. 'Done,' he said upon fixing his signature to the legislation. He signed it in the Oval Office with Vice President Kamala Harris at his side.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

           <meta content="15" itemprop="position"/>
           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9352287/Usher-positive-COVID-test-shuttered-Broadway-reflects-hell-patient-zero.html" itemprop="url">
             'I broke Broadway': Usher, 36, whose positive COVID test shuttered NYC theaters says he'll always be 'patient zero' - one year on from the closures
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9352287/Usher-positive-COVID-test-shuttered-Broadway-reflects-hell-patient-zero.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/21/40357844-0-image-a-78_1615499678632.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/21/40357844-0-image-a-78_1615499678632.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Peter McIntosh told Buzzfeed: 'Essentially, I was the one who broke Broadway'. Governor Andrew Cuomo abruptly closed theaters on March 12 last year - a day after news of Peter's diagnosis.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline">
            <ul class="article-icon-links cleared">
             <li class="first">
              <a class="comments-link" href="https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-9352287/Usher-positive-COVID-test-shuttered-Broadway-reflects-hell-patient-zero.html#comments" rel="nofollow">

               </span>
               <span class="linktext">
                <span class="readerCommentNo bold" rel="9352287">
                 84
                </span>
                comments
               </span>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class=" gr3ox">

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9351571/Sen-Chuck-Schumer-promises-increase-NYC-vaccine-supply-32billion-injection.html" itemprop="url">
             Chuck Schumer accuses Cuomo of withholding pandemic money from NYC: Dem leader hands $32BN DIRECT to Mayor de Blasio and says city doesn't always see the cash it's due
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9351571/Sen-Chuck-Schumer-promises-increase-NYC-vaccine-supply-32billion-injection.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/17/40349016-0-image-a-4_1615483314061.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>

             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             New York Senator Chuck Schumer appeared to take a swipe at the state's governor Andrew Cuomo during a press briefing with Mayor Bill de Blasio on Thursday.
            </p>

           <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline">

          <h6>
          </h6>

        </div>
        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9352639/Bi-racial-high-school-senior-looks-white-failed-refusing-confess-white-dominance.html">
           Mother slams high school for failing her bi-racial son because he 'refused to confess his white dominance' and didn't 'link his identity to oppression'
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/news/article-9352639/Bi-racial-high-school-senior-looks-white-failed-refusing-confess-white-dominance.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/3097285652848031678/308x174_JPG_3097285652848031678.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="45" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/3097285652848031678/636x382_JPG-HD_3097285652848031678.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="46" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/3097285652848031678/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_3097285652848031678.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/3097285652848031678/636x382_MP4_3097285652848031678.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/3097285652848031678/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_3097285652848031678.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            William Clark, a bi-racial high school senior, who can pass as white, was allegedly failed by his teacher after he refused to confess his 'white dominance' during a class at his Las Vegas charter school. He received a failing grade in his Sociology of Change class after he refused to categorize and label his racial, religious and sexual identities. According to a lawsuit filed by his mother, Gabrielle Clark (left), in December 2020, William is described as having 'green eyes and blondish hair' and 'generally regarded as white by his peers'. His mother is black and his deceased father was white, according to court documents. During the class, William was reportedly asked to publicly reveal his race, gender, religious and sexual identities and 'then attach derogatory labels to those identities'. One of the exhibits that the lawsuit includes is a presentation slide (top right) that reads: 'Racism = Prejudice + Power. Therefore, people of color CANNOT be racist.' Now, according to his mother, it's unclear if her son, who attends Democracy Preparatory Academy at Agassi Campus (bottom right) in Las Vegas, will be able to graduate after being handed a failing grade.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline" data-social-first-article-links="">
          <ul class="article-icon-links cleared">

             <span class="linktext">
              <span class="bold">
               245
              </span>

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/home/books/article-9352181/Isaac-Newton-scientific-genius-saved-nations-economy-ruined-careers.html" itemprop="url">
             From gravity to depravity: Isaac Newton was a scientific genius who saved the nation's economy - but he also ruined careers, viciously feuded with friends, and was plagued with obsessive thoughts of sinful sex
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/home/books/article-9352181/Isaac-Newton-scientific-genius-saved-nations-economy-ruined-careers.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/20/40356134-0-image-a-56_1615494925879.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/20/40356134-0-image-a-56_1615494925879.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Patricia Fara writes about the final 30 years of Isaac Newton's (pictured) life, when he gave up his fellowship and moved to London to live a much more public, political life.
            </p>

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9352065/Chicago-high-school-science-teacher-66-convicted-pouring-liquid-nitrogen-student.html" itemprop="url">
             Chicago high school science teacher, 66, is convicted after pouring liquid nitrogen on student, causing burns to his finger and groin, in botched science experiment
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9352065/Chicago-high-school-science-teacher-66-convicted-pouring-liquid-nitrogen-student.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/22/40358924-0-image-a-4_1615500175448.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/22/40358924-0-image-a-4_1615500175448.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Garry Brodersen, 66, was convicted on charges of reckless conduct and endangering the health or life of a child after he poured liquid nitrogen on a student at Bartlett High School in Chicago.
            </p>
           </div>

          </h6>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9350921/Georgetown-investigates-professor-saying-black-students-bottom-class.html">
           Georgetown Law professor is fired after saying black students are 'plain bottom of her class almost every semester' during Zoom meeting with another professor
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/news/article-9350921/Georgetown-investigates-professor-saying-black-students-bottom-class.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8732897601697461935/308x174_JPG_8732897601697461935.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="66" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8732897601697461935/636x382_JPG-HD_8732897601697461935.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="66" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8732897601697461935/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_8732897601697461935.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8732897601697461935/636x382_MP4_8732897601697461935.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8732897601697461935/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_8732897601697461935.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            Georgetown Law on Thursday firedProfessor Sandra Sellers, 62, over her comments about black students. She was filmed on a Zoom call with another professor stating that in her class, 'a lot of my lower ones are blacks'. She described her black students as 'just plain at the bottom'. Sellers was speaking to Professor David Batson who has been placed on administrative leave pending a further investigation. Batson did not respond directly to her comments in the conversation. The Black Law Students Association had claimed it shows Sellers bias in her grading and called for her termination as well as asking Batson for an apology for not responding to her claims. The Zoom call had been available for students to view on an online portal. Georgetown removed it this week after it was reported by a student, and launched a full investigation into the 'abhorrent' comments.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline" data-social-first-article-links="">

              <span class="bold">
               1.8k

           <meta content="21" itemprop="position"/>
           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9351391/Chicago-suburb-fund-reparations-black-people.html" itemprop="url">
             Chicago suburb to be first in US to pay reparations to black residents who will be offered $25,000 towards home ownership so long as they or their relatives lived there between 1919 and 1969 - and they'll use tax on legal marijuana to pay for it
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9351391/Chicago-suburb-fund-reparations-black-people.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/16/40345840-0-image-a-17_1615480920646.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/16/40345840-0-image-a-17_1615480920646.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Chicago's suburb, Evanston, is on its way to becoming the first in the US to fund reparations for its black residents after Robin Simmons (pictured) proposed the legislation.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline" data-social-first-article-links="">

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">

            </a>
           </h2>

            </a>
            <p>
             Tim Pool, who has more than three million YouTube subscribers, has found himself embroiled in a public spat with two of his former business partners: Emily Molli and Rocco Castoro.
            </p>

             </li>

           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="home item thin_divide module">
         <div class="thin-split ccox link-ccox linkro-box bdrcc">
          <h6>
          </h6>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9351315/Residents-wealthy-Atlanta-community-push-police-force-amid-crime-wave.html">
           Atlanta's richest neighborhood Buckhead pushes for SECESSION and its own police force amid crime explosion: Footage captures homeowner running for his life from rifle-wielding robber
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/news/article-9351315/Residents-wealthy-Atlanta-community-push-police-force-amid-crime-wave.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/6447665018388132488/308x174_JPG_6447665018388132488.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="40" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/6447665018388132488/636x382_JPG-HD_6447665018388132488.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="41" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/6447665018388132488/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_6447665018388132488.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/6447665018388132488/636x382_MP4_6447665018388132488.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/6447665018388132488/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_6447665018388132488.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            The Buckhead Exploratory Committee, made up of residents of the city's richest neighborhood of Buckhead, are looking to break away from the city as a surge in violent crime has left people 'genuinely concerned for their safety.' In January, one woman was thrown to the ground on her driveway and had a gun held to her head before robbers made off with her purse and cellphone. Home surveillance footage of a separate incident shows a man sprinting to reach the safety of his home as a car pulled up outside with a man touting a rifle (left). Meanwhile, in December, a seven-year-old girl was shot dead while Christmas shopping. Crime data from Atlanta Police Department shows robberies increased 40 percent in the period running January 1 to February 20 compared to last year. Aggravated assaults also increased 35 percent, auto theft 63 percent and larceny from auto theft 32 percent. Across the city as a whole, homicides were up 80 percent compared to the same period last year, shootings 32 percent and robberies 17 percent (chart on right). Research shows crime rose in most US cities last year, with homicides up in 29 of 34 cities surveyed.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/sciencetech/article-9353061/Jeff-Bezos-Blue-Origin-NASA-plan-create-moon-like-gravity-inside-New-Shepard-rocket.html" itemprop="url">
             Jeff Bezos' Blue Origin and NASA plan to create moon-like gravity inside the New Shepard rocket by spinning it 11 times per minute during flight to test payloads set for the Artemis mission
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">

             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Blue Origin and NASA are modifying the New Shepard rocket to create artificial gravity while it free-falls during flight in an attempt to simulate moon-like gravity to prepare for NASA's Artemis mission.

          <h6>
          </h6>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9351371/PICTURED-Five-Oklahoma-City-cops-face-degree-manslaughter-charges-shooting-dead-teen.html">
           PICTURED: Five Oklahoma City cops who shot dead 15-year-old gas station robber in hail of 13 bullets AFTER he'd thrown down his weapon and surrendered: All five face life in prison if convicted of first-degree manslaughter
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/news/article-9351371/PICTURED-Five-Oklahoma-City-cops-face-degree-manslaughter-charges-shooting-dead-teen.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/5558433138562281782/308x174_JPG_5558433138562281782.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="62" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/5558433138562281782/636x382_JPG-HD_5558433138562281782.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="61" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/5558433138562281782/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_5558433138562281782.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/5558433138562281782/636x382_MP4_5558433138562281782.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/5558433138562281782/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_5558433138562281782.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            The five Oklahoma City police officers charged with first-degree manslaughter after a 15-year-old boy was fatally shot while allegedly attempting to rob a convenience store have been pictured for the first time. Stavian Rodriguez, main and left inset, was shot 13 times by officers responding to reports of an attempted armed robbery at a convenience store on November 23 last year. The officers who have been charged after firing lethal rounds are: Bethany Sears, top left, Jared Barton, top right, Corey Adams, bottom left, John Skuta, bottom center, and Brad Pemberton, bottom right. If convicted, they could face up to life in prison. A sixth officer, Sarah Carli, was the first to fire a 'less-lethal' weapon and will not be charged, cops said. Surveillance video obtained by KOCO appears to show Rodriguez attempting to cooperate with police when he was shot.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

          <div class="article article-small" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
           <meta content="29" itemprop="position"/>
           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9351011/Jeffrey-Epsteins-Upper-East-mansion-sells-51million-mystery-buyer.html" itemprop="url">
             Bargain if you don't mind the history! Mystery buyer snaps up Epstein's NYC mansion for $51m - more than $35m cheaper than $88m asking price
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9351011/Jeffrey-Epsteins-Upper-East-mansion-sells-51million-mystery-buyer.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/14/40342656-0-image-a-36_1615473419045.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/14/40342656-0-image-a-36_1615473419045.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             The pre-war home on East 71st street in the heart of New York City sold for $51 million to an undisclosed buyer. New claims will begin to be issued after claim payouts were suspended on Feb. 4.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline">

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">

             Mississippi Gov. Reeves signs bill banning transgender athletes from female sports teams: Says that Biden 'left us no choice' and accuses the president of 'encouraging transgenderism in children'
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9352073/Mississippi-Gov-Reeves-signs-bill-banning-transgender-athletes-female-sports-teams.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/19/40354728-0-image-a-2_1615492260044.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>

             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Mississippi on Thursday became the first state this yearto enact a ban on transgender athletes competing ongirls' or women's sports teams, as Governor Tate Reeves signed the bill into law.

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">

            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9352063/House-Democrats-pass-gun-control-bills-require-background-checks-firearms-sales.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/19/40352934-0-image-a-2_1615489329185.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>

             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             The House passed two bills Thursday to require background checks on all firearms sales and transfers and to allow an expanded 10-day review for gun purchases.

        <div class="home item gradient_divide module">
         <div class="gradient-split wocc link-wocc linkro-wocc">
          <h6>
           CRISIS AT THE PALACE
          </h6>
          <div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9352657/Queen-Charles-William-insisted-royals-not-racist-family.html">
           Queen and Prince Charles back angry Prince William after he broke family silence to blast back at Harry and Meghan's race claims and insist royals are 'very much NOT racist'
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/news/article-9352657/Queen-Charles-William-insisted-royals-not-racist-family.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8517406150252511917/308x174_JPG_8517406150252511917.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="63" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8517406150252511917/636x382_JPG-HD_8517406150252511917.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="63" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8517406150252511917/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_8517406150252511917.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8517406150252511917/636x382_MP4_8517406150252511917.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8517406150252511917/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_8517406150252511917.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            Prince William (pictured right during a school visit today with wife Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge) yesterday became the first senior Windsor to address directly the string of allegations made by Harry and Meghan in their explosive Oprah Winfrey interview (pictured top inset). He also confirmed the depth of the rift between him and his brother. The Queen and Prince Charles (pictured together left in 2019) have backed the Prince after he spoke out to insist the Royal Family are 'very much not a racist family' as the fallout from Harry and Meghan's bombshell interview continues to grow. William admitted he had not even spoken to Harry about the TV show - four days after it aired. His reaction laid bare his clear hurt over the claims made by his brother and sister-in-law. The prince's comments were praised by insiders, who said the 38-year-old did 'very well given the emotion and enormity of it all'.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

             <span class="linktext">
              <span class="bold">
               6.2k

            <a href="/news/article-9352643/ROBERT-HARDMAN-steely-wise-reply-Amen-Wills.html">

            </a>
            <p>
             ROBERT HARDMAN: The Royal Family do not normally respond to shouty potshots from the media on the basis that a) it only encourages more of the same and b) they are not politicians with an opinion.

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9350413/Kate-William-head-official-engagement-Oprah-interview.html" itemprop="url">
             'We're very much NOT a racist family': Angry William publicly slaps down Harry and Meghan as he becomes first Royal to break silence since Oprah interview and reveals he hasn't spoken to his brother 'but will do'
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9350413/Kate-William-head-official-engagement-Oprah-interview.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/10/40335628-0-And_as_someone_who_has_campaigned_on_the_issue_of_mental_health_-a-40_1615460169039.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>

            </a>

           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9351197/Boris-Johnsons-sister-dragged-royal-race-row.html">

            </a>

             Britain's prime minister has refused to weigh in on the allegations made by the Duke and Duchess during their interview with Oprah Winfrey, in which a column by his sister Rachel Johnson was shown.

        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/femail/article-9350853/Gayle-King-says-Meghan-Markle-plenty-receipts-bombshell-interview-allegations.html">
           Oprah's pal Gayle King doubles down on claims that Meghan Markle 'has plenty of receipts' to back up her explosive interview allegations - after Duchess' friend insisted Sussexes have kept 'emails and texts'
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/femail/article-9350853/Gayle-King-says-Meghan-Markle-plenty-receipts-bombshell-interview-allegations.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8195439560200899828/308x174_JPG_8195439560200899828.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="48" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8195439560200899828/636x382_JPG-HD_8195439560200899828.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="48" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8195439560200899828/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_8195439560200899828.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8195439560200899828/636x382_MP4_8195439560200899828.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8195439560200899828/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_8195439560200899828.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            Gayle, 66, once again discussed the fallout from Harry and Meghan's explosive interview with her friend Oprah Winfrey on Thursday's CBS This Morning. She discussed some of the allegations that were made during the sit-down, including claims that Meghan was a victim of racism. Gayle claimed that the Duchess, 39, 'has plenty of receipts' to back up the extraordinary allegations made during the interview. Her comments come days after Meghan's close friend Janina Gavankar (inset) said that the Sussexes have kept 'emails and texts' to support their bombshell claims. The Queen released a statement on Tuesday in response to the interview, saying that the royal family was 'saddened' and 'concerns' by the allegations. Statement also said that 'recollections may vary' - a point that Janina, 40, firmly rejected, saying: 'Though their recollections may vary, ours don't.'
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article article-tri-headline" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
         <meta content="43" itemprop="position"/>
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9352417/Digital-artwork-Beeples-fetches-nearly-70-million-auction.html" itemprop="url">
           Digital-only artwork 'The First 5000 Days' by Beeple which exists as a JPG file sells at Christie's auction for $69.3 million after being listed for $100 - making him the third most valuable living artist
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="articletext">
          <a href="/news/article-9352417/Digital-artwork-Beeples-fetches-nearly-70-million-auction.html">
           <img alt="Digital artwork which only exists as a JPG file sells at Christie's for $69.3MILLION" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/22/40359114-0-image-a-89_1615500321703.jpg" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="636"/>
           <noscript>
            <img alt="Digital artwork which only exists as a JPG file sells at Christie's for $69.3MILLION" height="382" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/22/40359114-0-image-a-89_1615500321703.jpg" width="636"/>
           </noscript>
          </a>
          <div>
           <p>
            'Everydays: The First 5,000 Days' (pictured main) by 39-year-old South Carolina artist Beeple, whose real name is Mike Winkelmann (pictured left), sold fora record $69.3 million on Thursday at Christie's, placing him among the top three most valuable living artists. The artwork exists only as a JPG file. It is the most expensive ever 'non-fungible token', a unique digital token encrypted with an artist's signature which verifies its ownership and authenticity and is permanently attached to the piece. It fetched the highest price in an online-only auction and the highest price for any winning bid placed online. It also marks the first time a major auction house has offered a digital-only artwork with a non-fungible token as a guarantee of its authenticity, as well as the first-time cryptocurrency has been used to pay for an artwork at auction. The 5,000-image collage is based on a project beginning on May 1, 2007, when Beeple was a bored web designer and started to create a work of art each day, without interruption, to improve his drawing and graphic design.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline">
          <ul class="article-icon-links cleared">

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/sciencetech/article-9352771/More-2-000-songbirds-died-Salmonellosis-outbreak-California.html" itemprop="url">
             More than 2,000 songbirds have died from a Salmonellosis outbreak in California that is being passed through contaminated feeders
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/sciencetech/article-9352771/More-2-000-songbirds-died-Salmonellosis-outbreak-California.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/22/40359858-0-image-a-47_1615501565730.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/22/40359858-0-image-a-47_1615501565730.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             The California Department of Fish and Wildlife report some 2,000 birds have died from a disease cause by Salmonella bacteria that is being spread by birds sharing bird feeders with other infected birds.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline">

        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9352535/Moment-store-owner-chases-armed-robber-pulls-gun-demands-cash.html">
           Store owner chases hooded armed robber down the street after he stormed in, held her at gunpoint and demanded cash
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/news/article-9352535/Moment-store-owner-chases-armed-robber-pulls-gun-demands-cash.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/3893478413225801337/308x174_JPG_3893478413225801337.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="62" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/3893478413225801337/636x382_JPG-HD_3893478413225801337.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="63" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/3893478413225801337/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_3893478413225801337.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/3893478413225801337/636x382_MP4_3893478413225801337.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/3893478413225801337/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_3893478413225801337.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            Security footage has captured the moment a brave shop keeper stood up to a young would-be robber who pulled a handgun on her and demanded the contents of the cash register in Missouri. Pam Overstreet, owner of Pam's One Stop Bottle Shop in Avondale, even chased the young man down the street when he fled empty-handed from the store. The attempted armed robbery happened Wednesday morning. Overstreet said the thief maintained good manners during the crime. 'Very politely, he stepped back and was like, "Yeah, one more thing," and pulls out his gun. "Empty the register please",' Overstreet said.
           </p>
          </div>

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/femail/article-9352573/Parents-REGRET-having-children-reveal-really-like.html" itemprop="url">
             'You hate them, and you hate yourself for hating them': Parents who REGRET having children reveal what it is really like to raise a kid you resent and wish you never had
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/femail/article-9352573/Parents-REGRET-having-children-reveal-really-like.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/23/40360558-0-image-a-114_1615504830989.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>

            </a>

             Many of the people who responded to the Reddit. thread admitted that often think about what their life would be like if they never had kids.

         <div class="column-split">
          <div class="article article-small" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
           <meta content="48" itemprop="position"/>
           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/sciencetech/article-9351835/Air-pollution-increase-risk-HAY-FEVER-study-shows.html" itemprop="url">
             Exposure to air pollution as a baby or even while in the womb can increase the chance of developing hay fever later in life
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/sciencetech/article-9351835/Air-pollution-increase-risk-HAY-FEVER-study-shows.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/17/40349528-0-image-m-51_1615483241055.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/17/40349528-0-image-m-51_1615483241055.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Doctors studied health data from 140,911 infants in Taiwan and satellite images of their home towns to track pollution levels, finding those in high pollution areas were at greater risk of hay fever.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline">
            <ul class="article-icon-links cleared">
             <li class="first">
              <a class="comments-link" href="https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sciencetech/article-9351835/Air-pollution-increase-risk-HAY-FEVER-study-shows.html#comments" rel="nofollow">

        <div class="home item gradient_divide module">
         <div class="gradient-split wocc link-wocc linkro-wocc">
          <h6>
           DEFEATING CORONAVIRUS
          </h6>
          <div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9351741/Woman-attacked-coughed-Uber-driver-refuses-apologize.html">
           'He lucky as hell': Anti-masker who ripped off Uber driver's mask and coughed on him defends herself in bizarre Instagram video in her underwear saying she almost beat him up after he 'tried to kick me out in the hood'
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/news/article-9351741/Woman-attacked-coughed-Uber-driver-refuses-apologize.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/4905657752856868832/308x174_JPG_4905657752856868832.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="70" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/4905657752856868832/636x382_JPG-HD_4905657752856868832.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="70" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/4905657752856868832/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_4905657752856868832.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/4905657752856868832/636x382_MP4_4905657752856868832.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/4905657752856868832/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_4905657752856868832.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            The unnamed woman was with two others, who were both wearing masks, when Uber driver Subhakar Khadka picked them up on Saturday in San Francisco's Bayview District. Anow-viral video shows the women in the back seatberating Khadka after he asked the mask-less woman to cover her face. She then coughed on him, tried to grab his cellphone and ripped off his face mask. The woman, dressed only in her underwear, has since posted a video on Instagram in which she refused to apologize over the ordeal. She said she doesn't even have COVID-19and has threatened to sue the ride-sharing company because he kicked her out of his car.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9352383/Florida-COVID-whistle-blower-Rebekah-Jones-said-received-death-rape-threats.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/21/40357924-0-image-a-4_1615499266246.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/health/article-9352659/Novavaxs-COVID-19-vaccine-prevents-96-infections-against-original-strain-virus.html" itemprop="url">
             Novavax's COVID-19 vaccine prevents 96% of infections against original strain of the virus including 86.3% of UK 'super-covid' cases - but is only 55.4%effective against the South Africa variant
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/health/article-9352659/Novavaxs-COVID-19-vaccine-prevents-96-infections-against-original-strain-virus.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/21/40358530-0-image-a-53_1615498993678.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>

             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             A late-stage study found that Novavax's coroanvirus vaccine is be 96% effective against the original COVID-19 strain and 100% effective at preventing severe disease.

        <div class="article article-tri-headline" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
         <meta content="54" itemprop="position"/>
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9352301/The-COVID-15-real-40-Americans-say-theyve-gained-undesired-weight-COVID.html" itemprop="url">
           The 'COVID 15' is real! More than 40% of Americans say they've gained 30lbs during pandemic - and half of parents of elementary age kids admit they've been drinking more than usual
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="articletext">
          <a href="/news/article-9352301/The-COVID-15-real-40-Americans-say-theyve-gained-undesired-weight-COVID.html">
           <img alt="The 'COVID 15' is real! More than 40% of Americans say they've gained undesired weight" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/22/40359272-0-image-a-73_1615502454023.jpg" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="636"/>
           <noscript>
            <img alt="The 'COVID 15' is real! More than 40% of Americans say they've gained undesired weight" height="382" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/22/40359272-0-image-a-73_1615502454023.jpg" width="636"/>
           </noscript>
          </a>
          <div>
           <p>
            The average weight gain in that 42 per cent was 29lbs, according to the survey from the American Psychological Association. Additionally, 23 percent of adults who responded are drinking more alcohol to help them cope with the many stresses of the pandemic. That included 52 percent of adults who have children between the ages of five and seven.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

          <div class="article article-small" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
           <meta content="55" itemprop="position"/>
           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9349293/Vir-GSK-plan-seek-emergency-use-nod-COVID-19-antibody-therapy.html" itemprop="url">
             Covid treatment breakthrough as trial finds monoclonal antibody drug cuts risk of infected patients dying by up to 85%
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9349293/Vir-GSK-plan-seek-emergency-use-nod-COVID-19-antibody-therapy.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/09/40333310-0-image-m-43_1615454629672.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/09/40333310-0-image-m-43_1615454629672.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             GlaxoSmithKline's Vir-7831 treatment has been so successful that scientists have stopped the study early. The UK-based firm is seeking emergency use authorisation in the US.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline">

         <div class="column-split">
          <div class="article article-small" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
           <meta content="56" itemprop="position"/>
           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/sciencetech/article-9350419/One-tablet-ASPIRIN-day-reduce-risk-catching-Covid-19-29-study-finds.html" itemprop="url">
             One tablet of ASPIRIN a day can reduce your risk of catching Covid-19 by up to 29 per cent, study finds
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/sciencetech/article-9350419/One-tablet-ASPIRIN-day-reduce-risk-catching-Covid-19-29-study-finds.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/11/40335434-0-image-a-3_1615463740558.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/11/40335434-0-image-a-3_1615463740558.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Data from more than 10,000 people who were tested for Covid between February and June 2020 revealed taking one aspirin tablet (75mg) a day led to a 29 per cent lower risk of catching the virus.
            </p>
           </div>

        <div class="article article-tri-headline" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
         <meta content="57" itemprop="position"/>
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/tvshowbiz/article-9353145/Hilaria-Baldwin-shares-professional-snap-newborn-daughter-Maria-Lucia.html" itemprop="url">
           Hilaria Baldwin shares professional photo of newborn daughterMaria Lucia two weeks after she arrived via surrogate and five months after the birth of son Eduardo
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="articletext">
          <a href="/tvshowbiz/article-9353145/Hilaria-Baldwin-shares-professional-snap-newborn-daughter-Maria-Lucia.html">
           <img alt="Hilaria Baldwin shares professional snap of newborn daughterMaria Lucia" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/12/02/40366698-0-image-m-4_1615514451313.jpg" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="636"/>
           <noscript>
            <img alt="Hilaria Baldwin shares professional snap of newborn daughterMaria Lucia" height="382" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/12/02/40366698-0-image-m-4_1615514451313.jpg" width="636"/>
           </noscript>
          </a>
          <div>
           <p>
            Hilaria Baldwin recently welcomed her sixth child, daughter Maria Lucia, with husband Alec via surrogate, just six months after giving birth to their fifth child, son Eduardo. And the 37-year-old yoga instructor has been filling her Instagram following in on life at home with her brood, including the sweet nickname she awarded her newborn daughter. '2 weeks of MariLu...she's keeping us all in line,' captioned Baldwin, who included a precious professional shot of 'MariLu' resting atop a furry blanket.
           </p>
          </div>

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9351399/Oh-birthday-week-Dr-Seuss-books.html" itemprop="url">
             Dr. Seuss book sales QUADRUPLE with more than 1.2 million copies bought in first week of March after publisher pulled six titles over 'racist stereotypes'
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9351399/Oh-birthday-week-Dr-Seuss-books.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/17/40349674-0-image-a-68_1615483743023.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>

             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             According to NPD BookScan, which tracks around 85% of retail sales, the top sellers weren't even the books being withdrawn. Sales traditionally go up during his birthday week.
            </p>

        <div class="article article-tri-headline" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
         <meta content="60" itemprop="position"/>
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/tvshowbiz/article-9352635/How-Guccis-Black-Widow-dressed-kill.html" itemprop="url">
           How Gucci's Black Widow dressed to kill: Penthouses, yachts, Ferraris... she had it all. So why DID the ex-wife of the fashion house's boss (played in a new film by Lady Gaga) have him gunned down by a pizza chef?
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="articletext">
          <a href="/tvshowbiz/article-9352635/How-Guccis-Black-Widow-dressed-kill.html">
           <img alt="How Gucci's Black Widow dressed to kill" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/21/40358106-0-image-a-27_1615498335745.jpg" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="636"/>
           <noscript>
            <img alt="How Gucci's Black Widow dressed to kill" height="382" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/21/40358106-0-image-a-27_1615498335745.jpg" width="636"/>
           </noscript>
          </a>
          <div>
           <p>
            That spring morning had broken clear and warm, and it was just after 8.30am when Maurizio Gucci (right), handsome scion of the famed fashion house, stepped out of his Milan apartment to make the short walk to his office on Via Palestro 20, just a stone's throw away from the city's fashion district. Clutching a handful of magazines and impeccably attired in a suit, tie and - what else? - Gucci loafers, he strode past the public gardens and headed up the short flight of steps on the way to his office. Unbeknown to him, however, another man had fallen in step behind him and, before Maurizio could head inside the building to commence another day's work at the helm of the Gucci empire, the gunman had pumped three shots into his back. As he collapsed on to the red marble floor, the coup de grace was delivered with a final shot to the head. Pictured: Patrizia Reggiani (left and right) and Adam Driver with Lady Gaga in character in House of Gucci (inset).
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="DailyMailCeleb">

          <div class="article article-small" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
           <meta content="62" itemprop="position"/>
           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9352261/Man-wearing-MOUSE-EARS-roamed-Joint-Base-Andrews-five-hours-boarded-government-aircraft.html" itemprop="url">
             Plane spotter wearing MOUSE EARS roamed Joint Base Andrews for five hours and boarded government aircraft after slipping past 'distracted' guard and through broken security gate
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9352261/Man-wearing-MOUSE-EARS-roamed-Joint-Base-Andrews-five-hours-boarded-government-aircraft.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/20/40355970-0-image-a-17_1615495020981.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/20/40355970-0-image-a-17_1615495020981.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Multiple security failures, a 'distracted' guard and a gate malfunction together led to a massive breach at Joint Base Andrews on February 4.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline">
            <ul class="article-icon-links cleared">

        <div class="home item thin_divide module">
         <div class="thin-split ccox link-ccox linkro-box bdrcc">
          <h6>
          </h6>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/sciencetech/article-9351969/Soar-Mars-Perseverance-NASA-shares-video-rovers-view-decent.html">
           Soar down to Mars with Perseverance! NASA releases video from rover's point of view as it flies through Martian atmosphere lands on Red Planet's cratered terrain
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/sciencetech/article-9351969/Soar-Mars-Perseverance-NASA-shares-video-rovers-view-decent.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/505662471869974070/308x174_JPG_505662471869974070.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="70" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/505662471869974070/636x382_JPG-HD_505662471869974070.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="70" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/505662471869974070/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_505662471869974070.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/505662471869974070/636x382_MP4_505662471869974070.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/505662471869974070/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_505662471869974070.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            NASA shared a video to Twitter showing moments before Perseverance touched down on Mars, but from the point of view of the rover that makes it feel like you are along for the journey. The 24-second video begins with the heat shield separating that allowed Perseverance's cameras to 'see' a cratered Martian world below for the first time. The video is a series of images snapped by the rover's Terrain-Relative Navigation system that NASA stitched together for the clip.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline" data-social-first-article-links="">

               81

        <div class="home item gradient_divide module">
         <div class="gradient-split wocc link-wocc linkro-wocc">
          <h6>
           DEFEATING CORONAVIRUS
          </h6>
          <div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="column-splitter">
         <div class="column-split first-column">
          <div class="article article-small" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
           <meta content="64" itemprop="position"/>
           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9350865/Carter-Clinton-Bush-Obama-not-Trump-urge-COVID-vaccination.html" itemprop="url">
             'Roll up your sleeves and do your part!' Former presidents Carter, Clinton and Bush along with their First Ladies all join forces to encourage vaccinations... guess Trump didn't get the memo?
            </a>
           </h2>

             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             All the living former presidents except for Donald Trump took part in two public service announcements encouraging Americans to get the COVID vaccine.
            </p>

           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9350767/Michelle-Obama-opens-lockdown-low-grade-depression.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/12/40339110-0-image-a-1_1615467265972.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/12/40339110-0-image-a-1_1615467265972.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Former First Lady Michelle Obama said she suffered from 'low-grade depression', whichshe said was heightened by George Floyd's death in May last year.
            </p>
           </div>

          <h6>
          </h6>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article article-tri-headline" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
         <meta content="72" itemprop="position"/>
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9351009/Bel-Air-mansion-One-verge-foreclosure.html" itemprop="url">
           America's most expensive home is on verge of foreclosure: Investors behind $500m Bel Air mega mansion complain that 'distracted' developer Nile Niami still hasn't sold the property but HAS been holding COVID parties and jetting to Tulum
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="articletext">
          <a href="/news/article-9351009/Bel-Air-mansion-One-verge-foreclosure.html">
           <img alt="Bel Air mansion 'The One' is on the verge of foreclosure" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/12/02/40344522-0-image-m-5_1615515796894.jpg" height="826" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="636"/>
           <noscript>
            <img alt="Bel Air mansion 'The One' is on the verge of foreclosure" height="826" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/12/02/40344522-0-image-m-5_1615515796894.jpg" width="636"/>
           </noscript>
          </a>
          <div>
           <p>
            Nile Niami borrowed $82.5million from Hankey Investment Co. to finance The One - a gargantuan, 20 bedroom home in Bel Air. He bought what was once in its place in 2012 then razed it and has since been promising the most spectacular home L.A. has ever seen. In 2018, Hankey gave him $27.5million for the project and other, unnamed investors also contributed. He claimed he could sell it for $500million but after more than two months on the market, it has not sold. The investors have served Niami with a default notice, giving him 90 days to repay them or the house will go to foreclosure. They also say there are other investors involved in the project but it's unclear who those people are. Niami was fined five times between April and August for having parties during the COVID-19 lockdown. He has also been jetting from California to Tulum in Mexico and Miami.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

            <a href="/news/article-9352429/Mayor-pushed-guaranteed-income-advise-governor.html" itemprop="url">

            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9352429/Mayor-pushed-guaranteed-income-advise-governor.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/22/40360606-0-image-a-36_1615502402524.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>

            </a>

            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9352149/Sexual-orientation-axed-South-Carolina-hate-crime-bill.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/21/40353242-0-image-m-78_1615498776202.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>

             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             A South CarolinaHouse subcommittee has passed an amendment removing sexual orientation, creed, gender, age and ancestry from a hate crime bill, which now includes only six protected groups.

         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/femail/article-9352385/Sports-Illustrated-Swimsuit-unveils-diverse-cast-models-years-issue.html" itemprop="url">
           Meets Sports Illustrated Swimsuit's 2021 stars: Magazine unveils diverse cast of models for its upcoming issue, from veterans like Josephine Skriver and Lais Ribeiro to a curvy YouTube star and a COVID nurse
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="articletext">
          <a href="/femail/article-9352385/Sports-Illustrated-Swimsuit-unveils-diverse-cast-models-years-issue.html">
           <img alt="Sports Illustrated Swimsuit unveils diverse cast of models for this year's issue" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/21/40358904-0-image-a-96_1615499807592.jpg" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="636"/>
           <noscript>
            <img alt="Sports Illustrated Swimsuit unveils diverse cast of models for this year's issue" height="382" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/21/40358904-0-image-a-96_1615499807592.jpg" width="636"/>
           </noscript>
          </a>
          <div>
           <p>
            Sports Illustrated is revealing several of this year's Swimsuit Issue models ahead of the magazine's official launch in July. Among them isMaggie Rawlins (left), a former pediatric oncology nurse who returned to working in hospitals during the pandemic. There are also curvy models Marquita Pring (right) andNatalie Mariduena, the latter a YouTube star who works withDavid Dobrik. Tanaye White, 29, a 2020 #SISwimSearch winner, quit her high-powered corporate job to pursue modeling. Familiar faces include Lais (inset), Josephine, Danielle Herrington, and Kate Bock
           </p>
