        <div class="article article-tri-headline" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
         <meta content="78" itemprop="position"/>
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/femail/article-9352103/Ryan-Lochtes-model-wife-Kayla-29-deflated-breast-implants-removed.html" itemprop="url">
           Ryan Lochte's model wife Kayla, 29, has her 'deflated' breast implants removed after struggling with an array of scary health issues - from joint pain and loss of libido to suicidal thoughts
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="articletext">
          <a href="/femail/article-9352103/Ryan-Lochtes-model-wife-Kayla-29-deflated-breast-implants-removed.html">
           <img alt="Ryan Lochte's model wife Kayla, 29, has her 'deflated' breast implants removed" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/20/40355018-0-image-a-62_1615495912442.jpg" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="636"/>
           <noscript>
            <img alt="Ryan Lochte's model wife Kayla, 29, has her 'deflated' breast implants removed" height="382" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/20/40355018-0-image-a-62_1615495912442.jpg" width="636"/>
           </noscript>
          </a>
          <div>
           <p>
            WARNING: GRAPHIC IMAGES Kayla Lochte, 29, revealed on Instagram Thursday that she had her breast implants removed the day before after suffering from breast implant illness. Breast implant illness, or BII, is an unofficial term that is used to refer to a number of health issues that are believed to be caused by breast implants. The former Playboy model opened up about her long list of symptoms that led to her decision to have explant surgery, saying she already feels better. Kayla shared photos and videos of herself pre- and post-opt, including before-and-after images to show how her skin tone has already improved. Ryan, 36, showed his support in the comments, writing: 'So proud of you.' In a series of Instagram Stories, Kayla gave her fans an update, saying her implants were 'deflated' and likely leaking into her body. The mom noted that in less than 24 hours, her dark circles are gone, her joint pain has disappeared, and the swollen lymph node in her neck has shrunk.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9352105/Reporter-threatened-two-BLM-protesters-air-George-Floyd-Square-Minneapolis.html">
           'We know what you are': Reporter is threatened by two BLM protesters live on air while reporting on demonstrators erecting barricades in Minneapolis' George Floyd Square
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/news/article-9352105/Reporter-threatened-two-BLM-protesters-air-George-Floyd-Square-Minneapolis.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/6942065970926170185/308x174_JPG_6942065970926170185.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="70" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/6942065970926170185/636x382_JPG-HD_6942065970926170185.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="70" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/6942065970926170185/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_6942065970926170185.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/6942065970926170185/636x382_MP4_6942065970926170185.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/6942065970926170185/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_6942065970926170185.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            Brian Entin (left), a Miami-based journalist with NewsNationNow , was reporting on Tuesday near the scene where Floyd, a 46-year-old black man, was arrested by Derek Chauvin and three other police officers on May 25. Two unidentified individuals - a man and a woman (right), both of whom were wearing face coverings and clad in black pants and jackets - approached from behind the barricade just feet away from Entin and his cameraperson. 'You're going to be in a bad situation in a second,' the man is heard telling Entin. 'You need to get out of here,' the man says. The woman also tells him: 'Please go.' 'We know what you are,' the man says. 'You need to get in your car and go.' When Entin replies that he is with the news media, the man says: 'I don't give a f*** who you are. You need to get in your car and go.' Entin walks away and continues to film his news segment, which includes footage of the perimeter of the several blocks that have been sealed off by those in the 'autonomous zone.' Chauvin was filmed kneeling on Floyd's neck for more than eight minutes during which he is heard saying he could not breathe. He was rushed to a hospital, where he was pronounced dead. The video which went viral after Floyd's death ignited nationwide outrage and triggered large-scale protests and rioting throughout the country. In the days following Floyd's death, the scene of the arrest, adjacent to the intersection of East 38th Street and Chicago Avenue, Minneapolis, became known unofficially as 'George Floyd Square.'
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline">
          <ul class="article-icon-links cleared">

             <span class="icon">
             </span>

              <span class="readerCommentNo bold" rel="9352105">

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9350057/Mexico-set-legalise-cannabis-curb-drug-cartels.html" itemprop="url">
             Mexico is set to legalize marijuana and create 'world's largest legal market' in bid to combat country's powerful drug cartels
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9350057/Mexico-set-legalise-cannabis-curb-drug-cartels.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/09/40332366-0-image-m-29_1615453746767.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/09/40332366-0-image-m-29_1615453746767.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             The legislation backed by Mexican president Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador looks almost certain to be approved after a 316-129 vote in Mexico's lower house.
            </p>
           </div>

          <div class="article article-small" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
           <meta content="81" itemprop="position"/>
           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/sciencetech/article-9351019/Geology-Worlds-oldest-impact-crater-62-mile-wide-Maniitsoq-structure-isnt-crater-all.html" itemprop="url">
             'World's oldest impact crater' isn't an impact crater at all! 62-mile-wide Maniitsoq structure was created by geological processes 3 billion years ago and NOT a meteorite strike, scientists claim
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/sciencetech/article-9351019/Geology-Worlds-oldest-impact-crater-62-mile-wide-Maniitsoq-structure-isnt-crater-all.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/15/40344302-0-image-m-68_1615476320208.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/15/40344302-0-image-m-68_1615476320208.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Researchers have shown that the structure on the west Greenland coast was indeed created by the exact same geological process as the surrounding area.
            </p>
           </div>

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/sciencetech/article-9351281/Facebook-let-content-creators-earn-money-short-form-videos.html" itemprop="url">

            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/sciencetech/article-9351281/Facebook-let-content-creators-earn-money-short-form-videos.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/17/40349700-0-image-a-12_1615483861661.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>

             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Facebook is allowing content creators to place ads in videos as short as one minute in a bid to attract users from its rivals, like Snapchat and TikTok, which already offers ads as a revenue stream.

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9347291/At-10-hacking-groups-using-Microsoft-software-flaw-researchers.html" itemprop="url">
             Hacking groups linked to China exploit flaws in Microsoft Mail to pry on emails and steal data in 'industrial-scale cyber espionage'
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9347291/At-10-hacking-groups-using-Microsoft-software-flaw-researchers.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/08/40331580-0-image-a-6_1615451657937.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/08/40331580-0-image-a-6_1615451657937.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             The security holes in the tech company's mail and calendars system could make it vulnerable to industrial-scale cyber espionage, allowing hackers to steal emails from anyone with ease.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline">

        <div class="article article-tri-headline exclusive">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9348151/Heather-Locklear-appears-happy-carefree-busts-walk-friend.html">
           How Heather got her groove back! Engaged Locklear appears carefree as she busts a move while on walk with pal
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/news/article-9348151/Heather-Locklear-appears-happy-carefree-busts-walk-friend.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/1726459833310398056/308x174_JPG_1726459833310398056.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="63" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/1726459833310398056/636x382_JPG-HD_1726459833310398056.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="63" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/1726459833310398056/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_1726459833310398056.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/1726459833310398056/636x382_MP4_1726459833310398056.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/1726459833310398056/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_1726459833310398056.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            Heather Locklear was spotted looking happy and relaxed as went shopping with a friend in the San Fernando Valley on Monday. The actress, 59, was seen busting a move as she went on a walk, DailyMail.com photos and video show. She kept it casual in black leggings, a white long-sleeve shirt, LA Dodgers baseball hat and black Adidas sneakers. Heather opted not to wear her engagement ring from fianc Chris Heisser. The couple are reportedly planning to marry in the near future despite lockdown restrictions. DailyMail.com broke the exciting news in June that three years after rekindling her relationship with her high school sweetheart, she accepted his proposal.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

          <div class="article article-small" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
           <meta content="85" itemprop="position"/>
           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/sciencetech/article-9350267/Palaeontology-Fossilised-remains-dinosaur-sitting-nest-eggs-embryos-inside.html" itemprop="url">
             Fossilized remains of a dinosaur sitting on a nest of eggs with embryos preserved inside is discovered in China in incredible world first
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/sciencetech/article-9350267/Palaeontology-Fossilised-remains-dinosaur-sitting-nest-eggs-embryos-inside.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/11/40336506-0-image-m-38_1615461276371.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/11/40336506-0-image-m-38_1615461276371.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             The find - a world first - is an oviraptorosaur, one of a group of bird-like,theropod dinosaurs that thrived from 130-66 million years ago, during the Cretaceous Period. It was unearthed in China.
            </p>
           </div>

          <h6>
          </h6>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article article-tri-headline" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
         <meta content="89" itemprop="position"/>
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9351397/Quaint-Italian-town-dwindling-population-offers-abandoned-homes-85p.html" itemprop="url">
           Time for a change of pace? Picturesque Italian town with dwindling population offers up its abandoned homes for $1- and you WON'T even have to pay a deposit
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="articletext">
          <a href="/news/article-9351397/Quaint-Italian-town-dwindling-population-offers-abandoned-homes-85p.html">
           <img alt="Quaint Italian town with dwindling population offers up its abandoned homes for 85p" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/15/40342606-0-image-a-45_1615476112319.jpg" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="636"/>
           <noscript>
            <img alt="Quaint Italian town with dwindling population offers up its abandoned homes for 85p" height="382" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/15/40342606-0-image-a-45_1615476112319.jpg" width="636"/>
           </noscript>
          </a>
          <div>
           <p>
            Laurenzana, in the southern region of Basilicata, is enticing newcomers by scrapping the usual caveats of deposits and legal fees which can rise to more than $8,000. All the mayor asks is that prospective buyers complete renovations within three years and are prepared to spend at least $20,000 to return them to their rustic glory. Homes range in size from 130 to 500 square feet, but the real selling point is the stunning location of the town which rises over the Serrapotamo valley, just a stones throw from the city of Maratea, a UNESCO World Heritage site.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline" data-social-first-article-links="">
          <ul class="article-icon-links cleared">

             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="linktext">

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9352183/Gov-Cuomos-office-referred-latest-sexual-harassment-police.html" itemprop="url">

            </a>
           </h2>

          <h6>
          </h6>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article article-tri-headline" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
         <meta content="94" itemprop="position"/>
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/femail/article-9351129/Theater-worker-moves-school-bus-losing-job-amid-pandemic.html" itemprop="url">
           Theater worker who lost her job during the pandemic moves into old school bus to save THOUSANDS on rent - after renovating the $12,000 vehicle with furniture she found on the street
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="articletext">
          <a href="/femail/article-9351129/Theater-worker-moves-school-bus-losing-job-amid-pandemic.html">
           <img alt="Theater worker moves into a school bus after losing her job amid the pandemic" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/21/40358852-0-image-m-4_1615499923984.jpg" height="568" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="636"/>
           <noscript>
            <img alt="Theater worker moves into a school bus after losing her job amid the pandemic" height="568" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/21/40358852-0-image-m-4_1615499923984.jpg" width="636"/>
           </noscript>
          </a>
          <div>
           <p>
            Jasmine Glenn, 33, who is originally from Boston, was working as a master carpenter at a theater in San Francisco's Bay Area when the pandemic started. She lost her job when the theaters shut down and she took the opportunity to embrace a more nomadic lifestyle, which also gave her more financial freedom. Jasmine used up her savings to buy an old school bus for $12,000, and she then spent just over $4,600 on the renovations, sourcing many materials for free. She's been living in the bus since October, with her dog Baloo and cat Bagheera. The carpenter has been traveling across the country for the past five months and she says she couldn't be happier with her nomadic lifestyle.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/femail/article-9352505/Cat-obsessed-man-enjoys-SPA-SESSION-three-pats.html">
           Feline relaxed? Cat-obsessed man enjoys a SPA SESSION with his three pets - complete with cucumber eye patches, sheet masks, and relaxing music
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/femail/article-9352505/Cat-obsessed-man-enjoys-SPA-SESSION-three-pats.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/5267444640129041962/308x174_JPG_5267444640129041962.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="70" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/5267444640129041962/636x382_JPG-HD_5267444640129041962.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="70" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/5267444640129041962/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_5267444640129041962.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/5267444640129041962/636x382_MP4_5267444640129041962.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/12/5267444640129041962/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_5267444640129041962.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            Kareem Khalil, 31, from Irvine, California, owns three cats, and has an entire TikTok account dedicated to his life with them. His partner Fifi Furrha, 28, recently filmed Kareem enjoying a pamper session with the three pussycats and then posted the clip online. It racked up more than 13.7 million views on TikTok, while hundreds of thousands of people watched the clip on Instagram. In the video, Kareem can be seen lying back on his bed alongside his three cats, who all have cucumber slices on their eyes. According to Fifi, the cats loved the pamper session and actually fell asleep while they were filming the funny clip.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9352651/Ex-football-player-smashes-windshield-overturned-truck-fists-rescue-trapped-driver.html">
           Dramatic video shows former college football player punching through the windshield of an overturned truck to rescue trapped driver
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/news/article-9352651/Ex-football-player-smashes-windshield-overturned-truck-fists-rescue-trapped-driver.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8951053774290861771/308x174_JPG_8951053774290861771.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="67" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8951053774290861771/636x382_JPG-HD_8951053774290861771.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="66" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8951053774290861771/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_8951053774290861771.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8951053774290861771/636x382_MP4_8951053774290861771.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/8951053774290861771/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_8951053774290861771.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            A Good Samaritan climbed into an overturned truck where a woman was trapped behind the wheel and punched through the windshield with his bare hands (left), extricating her to safety (right). Dramatic cell phone video captured the rescue that took place along Highway 160 last Saturday afternoon near Arden-Arcade, California, just east of the state capital city Sacramento. Video shows Nicholas Lee, a former defensive lineman for the Sierra College football team, climbing into the overturned truck to help a woman trapped inside. Lee is seen punching and kicking his way through the windshield. Initially, he uses his foot to try and crack through the windshield. He then uses his fists to punch a hole in the glass as others warn him he might cut himself doing so. Lee manages to break through the glass and help the trapped woman to safety.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

          <h6>
          </h6>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article article-tri-headline" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
         <meta content="105" itemprop="position"/>
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/femail/article-9352035/American-Pie-actor-Thomas-Ian-Nicholas-recalls-life-child-star-90s.html" itemprop="url">
           Inside the wild life of a 90s child star: American Pie actor recalls drinking beer with Kate Winslet at 14, getting 'ultimate wedgie' from 50-year-old Gary Busey on set - and Daniel Craig 'filling a bathtub' with wild cannabis
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="articletext">
          <a href="/femail/article-9352035/American-Pie-actor-Thomas-Ian-Nicholas-recalls-life-child-star-90s.html">
           <img alt="American Pie actor Thomas Ian Nicholas recalls life as a child star in the 90s" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/20/40356358-0-image-a-69_1615495349296.jpg" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="636"/>
           <noscript>
            <img alt="American Pie actor Thomas Ian Nicholas recalls life as a child star in the 90s" height="382" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/20/40356358-0-image-a-69_1615495349296.jpg" width="636"/>
           </noscript>
          </a>
          <div>
           <p>
            Former child star Thomas Ian Nicholas, now 40, has opened up about his experiences with early fame in Hollywood. His big break was 1993's 'Rookie of the Year' with Garey Busey (top right), who carried him by his underwear across the lunchroom in front of 100 crew members. He starred in'A Kid in King Arthur's Court' with Kate Winslet (bottom right), with whom he shared her first beer in a pub in England. He recalled that while filming in Budapest, co-stars Daniel Craig (bottom right) andArt Malik collected a bunch of wild cannabis and filled a bathtub with it. Thomas also spoke about the famous webcam scene from 'American Pie' (pictured inset), saying 'they would just probably do it in a different way today.' He said: 'There are a lot of things that are being cancelled now. So, it's definitely not the right time to push the envelope on a teen sex comedy.'
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

        <div class="article article-tri-headline" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
         <meta content="110" itemprop="position"/>
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/femail/article-9347063/People-reveal-hilarious-interactions-theyve-shopping-online.html" itemprop="url">
           Does the attitude cost extra? Online buyers and sellers share their strangest exchanges - including a woman who discovered her boyfriend was CHEATING after seeing his bedroom in a photo
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="articletext">
          <a href="/femail/article-9347063/People-reveal-hilarious-interactions-theyve-shopping-online.html">
           <img alt="People reveal the hilarious interactions they've had while shopping online" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/10/15/40301220-0-image-a-79_1615391341942.jpg" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="636"/>
           <noscript>
            <img alt="People reveal the hilarious interactions they've had while shopping online" height="382" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/10/15/40301220-0-image-a-79_1615391341942.jpg" width="636"/>
           </noscript>
          </a>
          <div>
           <p>
            Instagram account Depop Drama shares hilarious exchanges between buyers and sellers from around the world on the shopping app. Pictured top row, left to right: A buyer lying about making a purchase, woman who caught her boyfriend cheating and another having surgery to fit a purchase. Pictured bottom row, left to right: Seller trying to pitch moisturizer, seller who can't be bothered to post their item and a buyer trying to avoid conflict from their purchase.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/femail/article-9348949/Personal-trainer-Rachael-Attard-reveals-really-happens-body-sugar.html" itemprop="url">
             What happens to your body when you quit sugar: Personal trainer reveals the startling effects of ditching it - and how long it REALLY takes to detox
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/femail/article-9348949/Personal-trainer-Rachael-Attard-reveals-really-happens-body-sugar.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/02/40322714-0-image-a-39_1615428777720.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/02/40322714-0-image-a-39_1615428777720.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Australian personal trainer Rachael Attard has revealed what really happens to your body when you give up sugar, and the raft of positive effects you can expect to see within just one week.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="Femail">
            <ul class="article-icon-links cleared">
             <li class="first">
              <a class="comments-link" href="https://www.dailymail.co.uk/femail/article-9348949/Personal-trainer-Rachael-Attard-reveals-really-happens-body-sugar.html#comments" rel="nofollow">

                </span>
                comments
               </span>
              </a>

         <meta content="113" itemprop="position"/>
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/femail/article-9350049/Mother-33-quit-job-waitress-twin-seven-year-old-daughter.html" itemprop="url">
           'Fame has given us such a better life': Single mom who became an Instagram hit by posing with her daughter, 7, in matching outfits reveals she's now made enough cash to quit her job as a waitress
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="articletext">
          <a href="/femail/article-9350049/Mother-33-quit-job-waitress-twin-seven-year-old-daughter.html">
           <img alt="Mother, 33, quit her job as a waitress so she could twin with her seven-year-old daughter" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/09/40332872-0-image-a-28_1615454712820.jpg" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="636"/>
           <noscript>
            <img alt="Mother, 33, quit her job as a waitress so she could twin with her seven-year-old daughter" height="382" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/09/40332872-0-image-a-28_1615454712820.jpg" width="636"/>
           </noscript>
          </a>
          <div>
           <p>
            Christy Orveland, 33, from Florida, has quit her day job to twin with her seven-year-old daughter Ella (pictured) online. The pair regularly wow their 100,000 Instagram followers with their almost identical features and sweet matching outfits. With striking eyes and blonde hair, they love to twin in adorable outfits and pose for fun pictures for their impressive feed. Before making it big on Instagram, Christy was a waitress but had always dreamed of being a stay-at-home-mum so she could spend as much time with her daughter as possible.
           </p>
          </div>

        <div class="article article-tri-headline" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
         <meta content="116" itemprop="position"/>
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9351697/A-homeless-woman-Mexico-claims-missing-American-woman.html" itemprop="url">
           Has a woman feared kidnapped in Texas 27 years ago been living rough on the streets in Mexico? Jane McDonald Crone's family wait to discover if the 62-year-old has finally been found
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="articletext">
          <a href="/news/article-9351697/A-homeless-woman-Mexico-claims-missing-American-woman.html">
           <img alt="A homeless woman in Mexico claims to be missing American woman" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/18/40350826-0-image-a-36_1615485889361.jpg" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="636"/>
           <noscript>
            <img alt="A homeless woman in Mexico claims to be missing American woman" height="382" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/18/40350826-0-image-a-36_1615485889361.jpg" width="636"/>
           </noscript>
          </a>
          <div>
           <p>
            The homeless woman identified herself as Jane McDonald-Crone after she was found resting under a blanket in the streets of the city of Monterrey, Mexico earlier this month. She came to the attention of a man who helps homeless people in the area by giving them food and other necessities. Jane McDonald-Crone went missing in November 1993 after leaving her workin Magnolia, Texas. Her car was recovered near her home days later. Officials are now trying to get a DNA test to find out if the homeless woman is McDonald-Crone.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/travel/escape/article-9350797/Dubais-incredible-heart-shaped-Love-Lake-middle-desert.html" itemprop="url">
             Pictured: Dubai's incredible intertwining heart-shaped lakes in the desert, with thousands of trees there spelling out the word 'love'
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/travel/escape/article-9350797/Dubais-incredible-heart-shaped-Love-Lake-middle-desert.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/16/40336466-0-image-m-33_1615480590705.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/16/40336466-0-image-m-33_1615480590705.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Called Love Lake Dubai, it covers an area of 55,000 square metres (592,015 sq ft) and Google Maps shows it is visible from space. It has proved to be a popular tourist attraction at ground level.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="travelmail">

               <span class="social-headline">
                Dubai's intertwining heart-shaped lakes in the middle of the desert
               </span>
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>

          <div class="article article-small" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/femail/article-9350915/Parents-slammed-pushing-CHILD-way-better-photo-Disney-World.html" itemprop="url">
             'Their kid could have been kidnapped while they were posing!' Parents are slammed for pushing their CHILD and stroller away so they could get a better photo of themselves at Disney World
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/femail/article-9350915/Parents-slammed-pushing-CHILD-way-better-photo-Disney-World.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/14/40341062-0-image-a-4_1615474416320.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/14/40341062-0-image-a-4_1615474416320.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Parents are seen posing for a photoin the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge section of Disney World's Hollywood Studios in a viral video. The mother stops to wheel her child's stroller several feet away.
            </p>
           </div>

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9349955/Filipino-dog-Luffy-goes-viral-grooming-visit.html" itemprop="url">
             Moment Luffy the dog gives his owner a huge SMILE as he spots her through window of dog grooming salon
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9349955/Filipino-dog-Luffy-goes-viral-grooming-visit.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/09/40333694-0-image-m-9_1615456528519.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/09/40333694-0-image-m-9_1615456528519.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Luffy the happy Shih Tzu was filmed at a dog grooming parlour in Imus, the Philippines. Footage of the cheerful pooch has since received more than 13 million views on TikTok alone.
            </p>

         <div class="thin-split ccox link-ccox linkro-box bdrcc">
          <h6>
          </h6>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/femail/article-9351625/Amazon-delivery-driver-caught-customers-security-camera-STEALING-new-MacBook.html">
           Prime for dismissal! Moment Amazon delivery driver 'STEALS customer's new MacBook' - after brazenly taking picture of the package to 'prove' it was delivered
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/femail/article-9351625/Amazon-delivery-driver-caught-customers-security-camera-STEALING-new-MacBook.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/2945272575238385924/308x174_JPG_2945272575238385924.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="62" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/2945272575238385924/636x382_JPG-HD_2945272575238385924.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="62" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/2945272575238385924/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_2945272575238385924.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/2945272575238385924/636x382_MP4_2945272575238385924.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/2945272575238385924/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_2945272575238385924.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            Vitaly, who is known as @talktomeiinstead on Tiktok, shared the alleged security footage on the platform, asking: 'Did this lady really just take my new MacBook?' The video shows a woman dropping off a package at someone's front door wearing what appeared to be an Amazon uniform. She then stepped back to take a picture, but instead of turning around and walking to her truck, she grabbed the package and took off with it. The shocking video has been viewed more than 1.2 million times, and thousands of people took to the comments to share their thoughts. Vitaly claimed in the comments that he was 'going to court,' though some insisted it wasn't his video.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

                 <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/02/01/14/38738860-0-image-a-20_1612191064651.jpg" height="122" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/i/furniture/misc/1x1_transparent.gif" width="217"/>

                  Kinzinger campaigns to take back 'lost' GOP
                 </div>
                </a>
               </li>
              </ul>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>

      <div class="cleared lead-alpha">
       <div class="alpha">
        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9347559/Moment-stray-dog-walks-clinic-Brazil-veterinarians-discovered-cancerous-tumor.html">
           Surveillance video shows moment stray dog walks into animal clinic in Brazil where physicians discovered a cancerous tumor
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/news/article-9347559/Moment-stray-dog-walks-clinic-Brazil-veterinarians-discovered-cancerous-tumor.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/10/3634415519766788601/308x174_JPG_3634415519766788601.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="52" data-frame-height="172" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/10/3634415519766788601/636x382_JPG-HD_3634415519766788601.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="53" data-hd-frame-height="356" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/10/3634415519766788601/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_3634415519766788601.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/10/3634415519766788601/636x382_MP4_3634415519766788601.mp4" height="356" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="356" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/10/3634415519766788601/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_3634415519766788601.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            A stray dog who was captured on video walking into a veterinary clinic in Brazil is now under the personal care of one of its physicians after he was treated for a cancerous tumor. A couple of clients were waiting with their pooches to be attended when the dog limped into the offices of Vet VIP in Juazeiro do Norte, Cear, on Saturday. Veterinarian Dayse Silva was standing behind the counter and approached the dog as he checked out his surroundings and sat.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">

             Wurst possible outcome: German burglary case is solved using DNA from half-eaten sausage left at the scene in 2012 - but red tape means crook will be let off
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9351115/Burglary-solved-using-DNA-half-eaten-sausage-left-scene-2012.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/14/40343148-0-image-a-98_1615473989430.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>

            </a>

             Officers in the western town of Schwelm said the DNA on the food matched that of a man detained in France over an unrelated crime.

           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/femail/article-9343193/How-influencers-change-bodies-VIDEOS.html" itemprop="url">
             Even VIDEOS can be edited to make you look slimmer: Influencer elongates her legs, nips in her waist and smooths her skin in seconds with the help of a 'scary' body edit app
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/femail/article-9343193/How-influencers-change-bodies-VIDEOS.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/09/17/40259218-0-image-a-151_1615310802510.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>

             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Influencer Danae Mercer, who lives in Dubai, shared a video demonstrating how the Pretty Up app can make her legs longer, smooth her skin, and shrink her waist.
            </p>

        <div class="article article-tri-headline" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
         <meta content="125" itemprop="position"/>
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/sciencetech/article-9351233/WWII-love-letters-discovered-floor-boards-Esplanade-Hotel-Scarborough.html" itemprop="url">
           'Yours forever, M': WWII love letters are discovered under floor boards of famous oceanfront hotel in England along with cigarette tins and chocolate wrappers
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="articletext">
          <a href="/sciencetech/article-9351233/WWII-love-letters-discovered-floor-boards-Esplanade-Hotel-Scarborough.html">
           <img alt="WWII love letters are discovered under floor boards of the Esplanade Hotel in Scarborough" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/18/40351874-0-image-a-7_1615489092384.jpg" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="636"/>
           <noscript>
            <img alt="WWII love letters are discovered under floor boards of the Esplanade Hotel in Scarborough" height="382" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/18/40351874-0-image-a-7_1615489092384.jpg" width="636"/>
           </noscript>
          </a>
          <div>
           <p>
            Love letters from WWII have been discovered under floor boards in a Scarborough hotel in the UK. Experts date the notes between 1941 to 1944, but the couples' names are unknown. However, the woman signed one letter with 'M,' which could help Scarborough Archaeological and Historical Society track down the sweethearts who were torn apart by wartime. One letter 'M' tells him that he has an abscess gum and another is about her seeing the film 'Star-Spangled Rhythm' with friends, but the all show a sense of longing for her absent beau.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline">

             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="linktext">

             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="linktext">
              <span class="bold">

      <div class="cleared lead-alpha">
       <div class="alpha">
        <div class="article article-tri-headline">
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9350455/Disturbing-moment-fisherman-skulls-bourbon-dead-FISH.html">
           'That's just wrong': Fisherman is blasted over stomach-churning video showing him neck a can of bourbon out of a dead FISH
          </a>
         </h2>
         <a href="/news/article-9350455/Disturbing-moment-fisherman-skulls-bourbon-dead-FISH.html">
          <img data-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/7244796803150794535/308x174_JPG_7244796803150794535.jpg" data-fps="7" data-frame-count="70" data-frame-height="184" data-frame-width="308" data-hd-film="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/7244796803150794535/636x382_JPG-HD_7244796803150794535.jpg" data-hd-fps="7" data-hd-frame-count="70" data-hd-frame-height="382" data-hd-frame-width="636" data-mol-fe-video-preview="" data-src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/7244796803150794535/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_7244796803150794535.jpg" data-video="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/7244796803150794535/636x382_MP4_7244796803150794535.mp4" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" width="636"/>
          <noscript>
           <img height="382" src="https://video.dailymail.co.uk/preview/mol/2021/03/11/7244796803150794535/636x382_JPG-SINGLE_7244796803150794535.jpg" width="636"/>
          </noscript>
         </a>
         <div class="articletext">
          <div>
           <p>
            The disgusting moment a fisherman (pictured left) knocks back a can of bourbon out of a fish has left countless TikTok viewers stunned. A man with a distinct Australian accent can be heard saying 'this is called the fishy,' in the video, which has been viewed close to 450,000 times. The man (pictured right) goes onto pinch the fish's lips, raise it above his head before drinking the bourbon with a twist.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline">
          <ul class="article-icon-links cleared">
           <li class="first">

             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="linktext">
              <span class="readerCommentNo bold" rel="9350455">
               73
              </span>
              comments
             </span>
            </a>
           </li>
           <li class="">
            <a class="videos-link" href="https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-9350455/Disturbing-moment-fisherman-skulls-bourbon-dead-FISH.html#video" rel="nofollow">
             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="linktext">
              <span class="bold">
               1
              </span>
              video
             </span>
            </a>
           </li>
           <li class=" gr3ox">
            <a class="https://mol.im/a/9350455| js-sl share-link" data-article-image="/1s/2021/03/11/11/40337704-0-image-a-32_1615463495278.jpg" data-email-share-style="email_share_article-drawer" data-headline="'That's just wrong': Fisherman is blasted over stomach-churning video showing him neck a can of bourbon out of a dead FISH" data-show-fbmessenger="true" data-show-flipboard="true" data-social-drawer="true" data-url="https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-9350455/Disturbing-moment-fisherman-skulls-bourbon-dead-FISH.html" href="#">

          <div class="article article-small" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
           <meta content="127" itemprop="position"/>
           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/femail/article-9348649/Why-need-learn-mothers-kiss-mums-quick-thinking-prevented-hospital-visit.html" itemprop="url">
             Why you need to learn the 'mother's kiss': How mum's quick-thinking move saved the day when her toddler stuck a pea up his nose
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/femail/article-9348649/Why-need-learn-mothers-kiss-mums-quick-thinking-prevented-hospital-visit.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/10/23/40318864-0-image-a-15_1615420447422.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/10/23/40318864-0-image-a-15_1615420447422.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             The simple trick every parent needs to know has been revealed in a video shared by an Australian mother showing what she did after her toddler son stuck a pea up his nose.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="Femail">
            <ul class="article-icon-links cleared">
             <li class="first">
              <a class="comments-link" href="https://www.dailymail.co.uk/femail/article-9348649/Why-need-learn-mothers-kiss-mums-quick-thinking-prevented-hospital-visit.html#comments" rel="nofollow">
               <span class="icon">
               </span>
               <span class="linktext">
                <span class="readerCommentNo bold" rel="9348649">
                 6
                </span>

         <div class="column-split">
          <div class="article article-small" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
           <meta content="128" itemprop="position"/>
           <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
            <a href="/news/article-9350111/Sheffield-pensioner-builds-matchstick-models-Notre-Dame-Tower-Bridge-global-venues.html" itemprop="url">
             Match making heaven! Retiree, 87, uses matchsticks to recreate some of the world's most iconic landmarks including the White House and Notre Dame
            </a>
           </h2>
           <div class="articletext">
            <a href="/news/article-9350111/Sheffield-pensioner-builds-matchstick-models-Notre-Dame-Tower-Bridge-global-venues.html">
             <img alt="" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/10/40333792-0-image-m-22_1615456965883.jpg" height="115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="154"/>
             <noscript>
              <img alt="" height="115" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/10/40333792-0-image-m-22_1615456965883.jpg" width="154"/>
             </noscript>
            </a>
            <p>
             Derrick, 87, from Sheffield, has been building model replicas of famous venues from across the globe for years. Some models, such as Tower Bridge and Notre Dame, can take him up to a year to complete.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline">
            <ul class="article-icon-links cleared">
             <li class="first">
              <a class="comments-link" href="https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-9350111/Sheffield-pensioner-builds-matchstick-models-Notre-Dame-Tower-Bridge-global-venues.html#comments" rel="nofollow">
               <span class="icon">
               </span>
               <span class="linktext">
                <span class="readerCommentNo bold" rel="9350111">
                 59
                </span>
                comments
               </span>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class=" gr3ox">
              <a class="https://mol.im/a/9350111| js-sl share-link" data-article-image="/1s/2021/03/11/10/40334454-0-image-a-25_1615457335957.jpg" data-email-share-style="email_share_article-drawer" data-headline="Match making heaven! Pensioner, 87, uses matchsticks to recreate some of the world's most iconic landmarks including Notre Dame and Tower Bridge" data-show-fbmessenger="true" data-show-flipboard="true" data-social-drawer="true" data-url="https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-9350111/Sheffield-pensioner-builds-matchstick-models-Notre-Dame-Tower-Bridge-global-venues.html" href="#">
               <span class="icon">
               </span>

                <span class="bold">

               </span>

                Match making heaven! Pensioner, 87, uses matchsticks to make landmarks
               </span>
              </a>

        <div class="article article-tri-headline" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="//schema.org/ListItem">
         <meta content="129" itemprop="position"/>
         <h2 class="linkro-darkred">
          <a href="/news/article-9352307/A-seemingly-innocent-Western-Australia-beach-snap-hides-killer-secret-toxic-slug.html" itemprop="url">
           This seemingly innocent beach snap hides a killer secret - so can you spot the toxic slug?
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="articletext">
          <a href="/news/article-9352307/A-seemingly-innocent-Western-Australia-beach-snap-hides-killer-secret-toxic-slug.html">
           <img alt="A seemingly innocent Western Australia beach snap hides killer secret - can you see the" data-src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/20/40355618-0-image-a-3_1615493793475.jpg" height="382" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="636"/>
           <noscript>
            <img alt="A seemingly innocent Western Australia beach snap hides killer secret - can you see the" height="382" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/03/11/20/40355618-0-image-a-3_1615493793475.jpg" width="636"/>
           </noscript>
          </a>
          <div>
           <p>
            Shire of Augusta-Margaret River in Western Australia's south-west have reported an abnormally high number of large sea hares washing up along the local coastline. The toxic slugs look like any other rock littered across the sand but smell bad are particularly dangerous to pets, the council said.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="article-icon-links-container" data-followbutton="MailOnline">
          <ul class="article-icon-links cleared">
           <li class="first">

             <span class="icon">
             </span>
             <span class="linktext">
              <span class="readerCommentNo bold" rel="9352307">
               11
              </span>
              comments
             </span>
            </a>
           </li>
